short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension designed to safeguard your proxy connection from cyber attacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
U Protection is a browser extension designed to detect/filter any proxy settings applied to the browser. This allows users to be informed and take action, determining whether they configured these settings themselves or if they were added without their consent. Given that many cyber attacks exploit ports and IP addresses, U Protection provides critical information and protection of any proxy settings, enhancing the user's security and control over their browsing environment.


To use this extension - you need to enter a license key, can contact us via our email , support@u-services.org , to get one.

The key is valid for 30 days. After it expires, you will need to obtain a new one.
